justification: "The first signal, termed centroparietal positivity (CPP), reflects accumulated sensory evidence and culminates to a threshold voltage around the time of the response."

justification: "Recording the EMG activity... allows researchers to partition each RT into two latencies: a premotor time (PMT, from stimulus onset to the EMG onset of the response)..."

justification: "...and a motor time (MT, from EMG onset to the response)."
